trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Biedt gegevens voor de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"> </xref> en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"> </xref> gebeurtenissen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>gebeurtenis treedt op wanneer de waarde van de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>eigenschap van de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>besturingselement verandert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>gebeurtenis treedt op wanneer de waarde van de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>eigenschapswijzigingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Zie voor meer informatie over het verwerken van gebeurtenissen [KROONTJESPEN: gebeurtenissen verbruikt](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When implementing a source for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, pass in `true` for `previousModeAutoSized` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> already had an automatic resizing mode and the new mode is different.
trans-unit.target: Bij het implementeren van een bron voor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>gebeurtenissen geven `true` voor `previousModeAutoSized` als de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>al is een modus voor het wijzigen van de grootte van automatische en de nieuwe modus verschilt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Als de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> eigenschap eerder is ingesteld op een <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> anders dan de waarde <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> of de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> eigenschap eerder is ingesteld op een <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> anders dan de waarde <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>; anders <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> was previously set to automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: Haalt een waarde die aangeeft of de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> eerder is ingesteld op automatisch vergroten of verkleinen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> class is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, so this property relates specifically to the previous state of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs>klasse wordt gebruikt met de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>gebeurtenissen, zodat deze eigenschap is gekoppeld naar de vorige status van een van beide de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eigenschap</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Als de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> eigenschap eerder is ingesteld op een <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> anders dan de waarde <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> of de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> eigenschap eerder is ingesteld op een <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> anders dan de waarde <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>; anders <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
